Definitions.Paraphrase:
drink with very small mouthfuls
啜，呷， 小口地喝，抿
To please his friends he sipped the wine.
为使他朋友高兴，他啜了一口酒。

1. (esp. AmE) darling; dear
亲爱的，宝贝
She began her letter with "Honey, I miss you." 
她在信上开头写道："宝贝，我想念你。"
2. sweet food that bees make 
蜂蜜

worried; anxious; physically ill 
不安的，担心的；不舒服的
Sandy's music made her father upset.
桑迪的音乐使她父亲不安。

make sb. worried or ill
使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适; 使（人）不安
Sandy's music upset her father.
桑迪的音乐使她父亲不安。

1. a hard lump in an animal body 
肿块, 节疤
We can have knots in our stomachs or our necks. 
在胃里和颈部都可能长肿块。
2. a fastening made by tying rope, etc.
结
There are some knots in the rope.
这条绳子上有几个结。
He tied a knot with the two ropes to make one long rope.
他把两根绳子打了个结连成一根长绳子。

very bad 
糟糕的，极坏的
The weather today is awful.
今天的天气很不好。
You've made an awful mistake.
你犯了个大错误。

way of dressing or behaving that is popular at a certain time
时尚
This type of shoes is in fashion now. 
这种鞋现在时髦了。
Really? I thought it was out of fashion.
真的？我以为这不时髦了呢。

out of fashion 
不时髦的；陈旧的，过时的
His ideas are old-fashioned. 
他的思想很陈旧。

(pleasing) pattern of musical notes
调子；曲调；旋律
The song has got a good tune.
这首歌的曲子好。

without tune; not musical; not tuneful
无旋律的；不动听的
The song is tuneful, but her voice is tuneless. 
歌很有旋律，可她的嗓子不动听。

(often pl.) words to a song or poem
歌词; 抒情诗
I'm deeply moved by this lyric of Shelley's.
我被雪莱的这首抒情诗深深打动了。

again and again
反复地，一次又一次
He repeatedly failed to pass the examination. 
他一次又一次地考试不及格。

1. please; attract; interest 
吸引, 有吸引力, 有感染力
Blue and red appeal to me, but I don't like gray and yellow. 
我喜欢蓝色和红色，但不喜欢灰色和黄色。
This music is too old-fashioned to appeal to young people any longer.
这音乐太老，不能再吸引年轻人了。
2. make a strong request for help, support
呼吁，恳求
The intimidated woman appealed to the crowd to help her find her lost child.
那受到恐吓的妇女呼吁人们帮她找回失去的孩子。

make free of
从...中清除, 使摆脱，解除...的负担
What will rid a house of mice?
用什么能消灭屋里的老鼠？

take one's attention away
分散注意力, 转移注意力，使分心
The loud music played next-door distracts me. 
隔壁房里大声放着的音乐分散了我的注意力。
The little boy cannot pay attention; he is distracted by the bird outside the classroom.
这小孩不能集中精力，教室外的小鸟分散了他的注意力。

one of the parts
部分
One section of the house is used as a store-room.
这房子的一部分用作仓库。

having or bringing good luck
幸运的, 侥幸的，吉利的
He's a lucky dog.
他是个幸运儿。

a person of from 13 to 19 years of age
青少年
These days the newspaper carries lots of stories about teenagers who are in trouble.
近些日子报纸上刊登了许多有关青少年遇到麻烦的新闻。

1. 眉，眉毛
He drew his heavy black brows together in a frown. 
他皱着眉头，浓黑的眉毛拧成了一个结。
2. 额
眼眉

who or what a person or thing is
身份；本体
It's a serious situation if one loses his identity.
失去个性可是件大事。

rebel against; challenge
（公然）违抗，藐视; 挑，激
He looked at me as if he was defying me to argue.
他盯着我，好像想激我与之争论。

push out; drive out; force out 
把......除名，把......开除; 驱逐，赶走，放逐
Each year more than 10 students are expelled from the university.
每年有10 多个学生被这所大学开除。

lasting forever
永久（性）的，固定的
Please write down your permanent address in the form.
请在表上填写你的永久性地址。

very different
彻底不同的，完全不同的,  根本不同的
His opinions are very radical.
他的观点非常激进。

a person who favors very different changes or reforms; persons with very different opinions
激进分子; 激进派
Sometimes modern artists are considered radicals.
有时侯，现代派艺术家被认为是激进派。

causing pain; hurting
悲伤的；痛苦的
She has a painful back. 
她背疼。

1. show the identity of; tell who or what a person or thing is
认出，鉴定出
The police cannot identify the body. 
警察不能确认这具尸体。
2. (with) cause (sb.) to be connected with 
使与……相连
The father thinks what Sandy disagrees with him about is closely identified with the generation gap.
父亲认为桑迪与他格格不入之处同代沟密切相关。

1. bad; unpleasant; harmful
不好的；负面的
Mr. Finch worries that the music may have a negative influence on his daughter.
芬奇先生担心音乐会给他女儿带来负影响。
2. no 
否定的
When the girl asked them if she could go out with her boyfriend, her parents gave her a negative answer.
当这姑娘问她父母她是否可以和她男朋友外出时，她父母给了她一个否定的回答。

an effect
影响, 影响力
Television has a strong influence on people.
电视对人们的影响很大。

have an effect on
（产生）影响
I don't want to influence your decision.
我不想影响你的决定。

1. worry; over-anxiety
关心；担心
The mother's concern over her sick child kept her awake all night.
母亲由于担心自己生病的孩子而整夜没睡。
2. a matter of interest or importance to sb.
关切的事，有关的事
Her major concern is to keep the communication line with her daughter open.
她主要关心的是保持与女儿的交流畅通。

be troubled or uneasy; cause to worry
使不安；使担心
The head was concerned that his men were too tired and hungry to fight.
头儿担心他的部下又累又饿已不能再战斗了。
Bill's problems in math class concern Sandy very much.
比尔数学功课不好使桑迪很不安。

anyhow; in spite of everything
不论怎么，不管怎么说
Anyway, Sandy has her own reason to like rock music.
不管怎么说，桑迪喜欢摇滚音乐有她的理由。

1. make a low sound of pain
呻吟
The sick man moaned in his sleep.
这生病的男人在睡梦中呻吟。
2. (about) complain
抱怨，发牢骚
She's always moaning that she has too much work to do.
她总是发牢骚说工作太多做不完。

a set time for a meeting 
约会
If you want to see the doctor, you'd better make an appointment with him in advance. 
如果你想见医生，最好事先跟他预约好。

a flat leather case for papers
公文包

(cause to) become an adult; become fully developed
（使）成熟；（使）长成
Girls mature earlier than boys. 
女孩比男孩成熟得早。

grown; fully developed
长大了的；成熟的
Sandy thinks she is mature and can make her own decisions about what to wear.
桑迪认为自己长大了，可以自己决定穿什么了。

fight against sb. in control
反抗；反对, 反叛
Sandy rebels at her father's idea of not listening to rock music.
桑迪不同意她父亲不去听摇滚音乐的主张。

ability to wait for sth. calmly for a long time
耐心, 忍耐
You need to have patience if you want to get served in this shop. 
想在这商店买东西，你得有耐心。

1. a piece of heavy metal for dropping into the water to stop a ship from moving 
锚
A big ship needs a big anchor. 
大船需要大锚。
2. sth. that makes one feel safe or supported
可依靠的人或物

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
calmly; in a peaceful and silent state
平静地
Please let me get on with my work in peace and quiet.
请让我平静地做完我手上的事吧。

make one angry
使（某人）生气
Seeing the driver beating his horse made the kind old man's blood boil. 
善良的老人看见车夫鞭打那匹马，心里很生气。

1. free oneself from (sth. unwanted or unpleasant)
清除
These pills will help me get rid of my cold. 
这些药片可帮我治疗感冒。
2. drive away；destroy
驱赶；消除
There are too many flies in the restaurant; they should think of a way to get rid of them.
餐厅里苍蝇太多，他们该想个法子把它们消灭掉。

feeling nervous, tense, unwell
不安
What's the matter with her? She seems to have the knots in her stomach.
她怎么啦？好像很不安似的。

do or say sth. that goes beyond accepted limits; go to extremes
走极端
I know you are radical in thinking, but don't go too far.
我知道你思想激进，但不要走得太远。

leave (school) without finishing one's studies 
退出
I don't think it's a good idea to drop out of school; you may get a spare time job. 
我看退学不是个好主意，也许你可找个临时活干干。

consider (sth.) in detail (with sb.) 
商量
I'd like to talk over that article you wrote about the film.
我想和你讨论讨论你写的那篇关于那部电影的文章。
